thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding
thread.title_full: Outstanding - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lilybits2016
title: Outstanding
text: We stayed in one of the suites last weekend and we found the whole experience outstandin.. we were a group of 16 girls on a hen night and appon arrival we were given a complimentary drink whilst checked in .. then shown individually to our suites with a complete tour of apartment. The customer service here was amazing and nothing was a problem to the staff after phoning a few times asking for different things. The location is fab 5 mins walk from Buckingham palace. Cannot fault in any way and would definitely be returning.
